mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ips_policy( detected_name, action, src_ip, src_port, content1, content2, content3, base_time, base_limit, level, detail, end_time ) VALUES( #{detected_name}, #{action}, #{src_ip}, #{src_port}, #{content1}, #{content2}, #{content3}, #{base_time}, #{base_limit}, #{level}, #{detail}, #{end_time} )
